content.text:
# Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Cartoon

The '''Nickelodeon Kids' Choice for Favorite Cartoon''' is an award category given at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards. This list also includes other information and other winners and nominees for the specific cartoon or relations to it. SpongeBob SquarePants has the most awards by a winning streak with 17 wins (22 overall). No other show has beaten it, however Avatar: The Last Airbender ended the streak in 2008, but it was regained in 2009 and every year since.
